meanings.definition: To have sexual intercourse with someone.
meanings.sent1: He boinks his girlfriend every night.
meanings.sent2: The couple boinks in the bedroom.
meanings.sent3: The movie character always boinks the love interest.
meanings.sent4: Their passionate embrace boinks them closer together.
meanings.sent5: The romance novel described their boinks in vivid detail.

meanings.definition: A sound made when hitting something.
meanings.sent1: The boinks of the hammer echoed in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud boinks when the ball hit the wall.
meanings.sent3: The boinks of the drumsticks added rhythm to the music.
meanings.sent4: The boinks of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The boinks of the door closing startled me.

meanings.sent1: The ball boinks off the wall and back to the player.
meanings.sent2: The rubber ball boinks high into the air.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected boinks of the basketball amused the players.
meanings.sent4: Her heart boinks with excitement before the performance.
meanings.sent5: The kangaroo's powerful legs boinks it across the field.
